--- title: fastai_transformers_utils keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Some utililties to help you using fastai2 to train huggingface transformers." ---

Install¶

pip3 install git+https://github.com/cwza/fastai_transformers_utils.git

Editable install¶

git clone https://github.com/cwza/fastai_transformers_utils
cd fastai_transformers_utils
make install

Run Test¶

make test
make test-slow

How to use¶

Please see the notebooks that named start with example and under nbs directory.

example_roberta_classification
example_gpt2_lm
